org.gvsig.geoprocess.algorithm.dissolve

Interface IDissolveRule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdjacencyDissolveRule, DissolveRule

    public interface IDissolveRule
    Forces to IDissolveCriteria to fetch geometries from ReadableVectorial (for performance reasons, once a criteria has verified a spatial conditions, it caches IGeometry, to avoid reading them many times)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getFieldName()
      Gets the index of the field to apply the dissolve rule

      Returns the name of the field for the selected function
      boolean isFunctionIncluded(java.lang.String func)
      Returns true if the selected function is included in the summary
      boolean verifyIfDissolve(Geometry g1, Geometry g2, Feature f1, Feature f2)
      Verifies if the given geometries will be dissolved
